shared_secret=(value)

REQUIRED summary: This is the shared secret that is used for subsequent HMACed request envelopes when the application makes a request to Microsoft HealthVault. remarks: This section describes the algorithm that will be used on the client side during subequenct requests. value is a HealthVault::WCData::Types::HMACAlgorithm
